dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Hi, I want to order a pizza for delivery

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Welcome to Pizza Palace! What size pizza would you like?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: I want a large pepperoni pizza

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Great choice! A large pepperoni pizza. What's your delivery address?

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: I'm sorry, we don't deliver to that area. We only deliver within 5km of our restaurant.

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: What? That's ridiculous! I've ordered from you before!

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Would you like to pick up your order instead?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: No, I want delivery! This is terrible customer service!

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: I understand your frustration. Let me check with my manager about delivery to your area.

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Forget it! I'm calling another restaurant!
